```pddl
[
  (:action start
    ; Start an activity and update its state
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?activity - activity)
    :precondition (and (knowledge ?activity unstarted))
    :effect (knowledge ?activity started)
  ),
  (:action select
    ; Select and transition the state of an entity
    :parameters (?entity - entity)
    :precondition (and (step ?entity unselected))
    :effect (and (step ?entity selected))
  ),
  (:action save_and_exit
    ; Save the state and complete the process for an entity
    :parameters (?entity - entity)
    :precondition (and (step ?entity selected) (choice ?entity nameless))
    :effect (and (choice ?entity named))
  ),
  (:action turn
    ; Turn a state of an item based on its current status
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?state - state)
    :precondition (and (knowledge ?entity ?state))
    :effect (and (turned ?entity on))
  )
]
```
